Syrian security forces kill 14 people and detain more than 200 in continued violence.
Yemeni security forces kill two anti - government protesters and wound several others.
Thousands march on Mexico City to protest deadly drug violence.
Egyptian Coptic Christians call for government resignations after several days of religious violence.
Russia celebrates the 66th anniversary of the collapse of Nazi Germany.
Record flooding continues on the banks of the Mississippi River in the southern United States.
